name: Patterns of Life
description:
For the Area Of Effect - https://itch.io/jam/aoejam2021 Game Jam

We just wanted an excuse to work in VR for a minute, so here it is! 

The game of life wraps around the walls that surround you. 

Place blocks with your fire buttons and right stick, A/B right stick for the Valve Index. Might work on the Quest, who knows.
